text: Tilda or TILDA may refer to: *Tilda, a variant of the female given name Matilda *Tilda (cocktail) *Tilda (food manufacturer), British food brand specializing in rice *Tilda (software), GTK+ terminal emulator *Tilda Johnson, the secret identity of Nightshade *Tilda Newra, municipality near Raipur City, India *Tilda Swinton (born 1960), British actress *Tilda Thamar (1921–1989), Argentine actress *The Irish Longitudinal Study on Ageing (TILDA) ==See also== * Tilde, , as in ,
title: Tilda
